resources.string: Intro: Press me to see notes

Two ways to add a task:
 
 1) Quick Add: Type the task into the quick entry box at bottom of screen and press the + button on the right.
 
 2) Regular Add: Press the + button of the quick entry box. Add as much detail as you want. Then press "Save" or use your phone's back button.
Add a widget to your desktop

A desktop widget is a great way to keep track of your to-dos and a quick way to add tasks.
 
 How to add a widget:
 1) Long Press on your phone's desktop
 2) Chose "Widget"
 3) Choose the Astrid widget
 4) Select a list to display (choose "Active Tasks" for all your tasks)

Back up and sync your tasks with Astrid.com for free:
 
 1) Press your Menu button
 2) Choose "Sync Now"
 3) Select "Astrid.com"
 4) Log In & Synchronize!
Tap task to edit and share
Tap list settings to share the entire list
Collaborators can help you build your list or finish tasks
